Event.MetaDescription: Please come and attend our Monthly Bhajan at Sindhi Mandhir
Event.Maindescription:
Our July monthly Bhajan will be as usual on 3rd Saturday 21st commencing at 3pm - Venue Sindhi Mandhir.

Please confirm your attendance.

Mandhir tel. No: 0208 450 1341

There is a car park attached to Mandhir on the rear side.
